item.description:
We will gather at the boathouse, and get on the (hopefully short)waiting list for our sail.  Sailing instructors and experienced sailors will be our skippers.  The actual sailing time is about 45 minutes. 

http://www.courageoussailing.org/

Time out on the water should fire up our appetites enough for a late lunch at the Warren Tavern.  Warren Tavern has been in operation since our Revolutionary era.

http://www.warrentavern.com/pages/about.htm
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting in front of the Courageous Sailing Boat House starting at 1:15pm
item.why: This is short notice, but---Spring is here, and Courageous Sailing, a non-profit sailing program in Charlestown, is having their annual open house. Free sailing is a great part of the opening weekend.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Open House at Courageous Sailing in Charlestown
